ai-tha-ap261:1.2_0: like a tree at the foot of a tree.
ai-tha-ap261:1.3_0: I made a plantain at the leaf-hut,
ai-tha-ap261:1.4_0: When the king had finished his meal,
ai-tha-ap261:2.2_0: an leaf hut, which buried his leaf-hut.
ai-tha-ap261:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap261:2.4_0: this hut is the fruit of giving.
ai-tha-ap261:3.2_0: And the sixteen kings presented him.
ai-tha-ap261:3.4_0: is said to have a wheel-turning monarch,
ai-tha-ap261:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kuṭikaṇṇa.
ai-tha-ap261:6.1_0: for the wide opening of the Elder Uttarāṇasī,
